testcase.name: initializationError

error.message:
Couldn't create parent directories of 'C:\Users\Ilona_Shabelnyk\IdeaProjects\CucumberHomework10\target\cucumber-reports\CucumberTests.json'. Make sure the the parent directory 'C:\Users\Ilona_Shabelnyk\IdeaProjects\CucumberHomework10\target\cucumber-reports' isn't a file.
Note: This usually happens when plugins write to colliding paths. For example: 'html:target/cucumber, json:target/cucumber/report.json' You can fix this by making the paths do no collide. For example: 'html:target/cucumber/report.html, json:target/cucumber/report.json' The details are in the stack trace below:
